main_text.speaker: A

main_text.text: Super intelligent AI, right?
main_text.speaker: A

main_text.text: This idea that there's a singularity event where we continue to keep putting more and more into it and it exceeds our intelligence.
main_text.speaker: A

main_text.text: Right.
main_text.speaker: A

main_text.text: Not just it can beat me in chess.
main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: We kind of hope that we still have things that we have that we can do better.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: At least I can do it more power, efficiently maybe, but how concerned are you with the AI?
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: So first of all, no concerns.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: It's not going to be intelligent the same way that we are.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: Maybe because the medium is different.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: You know, it lacks the hormones that make our intelligence somewhat more emotionally intelligent than that.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A

context_after_main_text.text: It won't be the same sentient the same way that we are.
context_after_main_text.speaker: A
